data.text: Claude Langlais is a games programmer. Langlais has been working with Ubisoft, Ubisoft Montreal and Kudosoft. Langlais's first published game was Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time released in 2003. Next, Claude Langlais worked on Assassin's Creed Valhalla taking on the role of programmer.
